sentences.en: He is the steward of that great estate.
sentences.cn: 他是那笔大财产的管理人.

sentences.en: He signed up as a steward with P&O Lines.
sentences.cn: 他签约了P&O航运公司，成为了一名乘务员。

sentences.en: He went around the world as a ship's steward.
sentences.cn: 他当客船服务员,到过世界各地.

sentences.en: He's the steward of the club.
sentences.cn: 他是这家俱乐部的管理员.

sentences.en: I am nobody, sir , except that I have the honor to be your steward.
sentences.cn: 我什么也不是, 老爷.我不过托福给你管管家.

sentences.en: Ms Winfrey has always been a vigilant steward of her brand.
sentences.cn: 温芙蕾女士一向对自己的品牌管理警醒.

sentences.en: My name is Robert Steward from Washington.
sentences.cn: 我叫罗伯特?斯图尔特,从华盛顿来的.

sentences.en: Purse - A frank and liberal steward of the blessings that God has bestowed.
sentences.cn: 金袋 - 上帝的真诚宽大的仆人,被赐予福泽.

sentences.en: So they told the steward about the money in their sacks.
sentences.cn: 于是他们便将麻袋里那些钱的事告诉了管家.

sentences.en: Sometimes he sent his house steward in his place.
Steward Burns has a bachelor's in math from Harvard.
sentences.cn: StewardBurns,有哈佛大学的数学学士学位.

sentences.en: The steward and chambermaid, and all, were busily engaged in cleaning and furbishing.
sentences.cn: 船上的男女侍役们都在忙着打扫和擦拭.

sentences.en: The steward placed him with three young women dressed like parrot Their hands were resting on the table, red speared at the tips.
sentences.cn: 列车乘务员让他，和三个打扮得,像鹦鹉的年轻女人，坐在一起,她们的嘴唇涂得红红的，手放在桌子上。

sentences.en: The steward reached out to stop her.
sentences.cn: 那位服务员伸手拦住了她.

sentences.en: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward .
sentences.cn: 他们还声称保安人员将一位乘务员推搡至一边。

sentences.en: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward.
sentences.cn: 他们还声称保安人员将一位乘务员推搡至一边。

sentences.en: You're asking me to stake my master steward on a card game?
sentences.cn: 你要求我在这个牌局中用我的管家做赌注?

words.tran_cn: 女管家；女干事；女服务员
管理工作；管事人的职位及职责

trans.tran_cn: （船舶，飞机或火车上的）服务员，乘务员，（私人家中的）管家， （比赛、游行等公共活动的） 组织者
trans.tran_en: a man whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship
